name: 180 (CCS)
overview: 180 is a darts simulation game. It will appeal to both dart players and non-dart players as it is extremely addictive. There are four types of games to choose from one player championship game; two player game 101, 301 or 501; Round the Board; and Snooker, a two player game, where sections of the board represent colours. There is no luck involved in these games - only 100% skill!
